text: nabivarayāṭa, duṣkara kālayehi ohu va anugamanaya kaḷā vū (makkāven) nikma giyavunaṭa hā (nikma giya makkā vāsīnṭa) udav kaḷavunaṭa allāh paścāttāpaya piḷigena samāva dunnēya. ovun aturin pirisakagē hadavat (venatakaṭa) næm̆buruvannaṭa tibuṇa da, pasu va ovun kerehi paścāttāpaya piḷigena samāva dunnēya. niyata vaśayenma ohu ovun sambandhayen sānukampitaya. karuṇāvantaya
